desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.jp: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.thai: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.ko: Sensei receives a letter from Abydos High School and learns the students there are being bullied by a criminal organization. In a hurry, Sensei heads toward the Abydos district, but gets hopelessly lost in the process.
desc.zh_tw: 老師讀了阿拜多斯高中寄來的信後，得知學生們受到暴力組織欺壓的消息，於是便前往阿拜多斯自治區幫助他們，但卻 一下子就迷路遇難了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师读了阿拜多斯高中寄来的信后，得知学生们受到暴力组织欺压的消息，于是便前往阿拜多斯自治区帮助他们，但却一下子就迷路遇难了。

desc.en: After taking office for several days, Aorona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.jp: After taking office for several days, Aorona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.thai: After taking office for several days, Aorona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.ko: After taking office for several days, Aorona said that many students had sent their help letters, in which one of them came from Abydos High School.
desc.zh_tw: 在上任幾天後，阿羅娜表示許多學生都送來了求助信，而其中一篇則來自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在上任几天后，阿罗娜表示许多学生都送来了求助信，而其中一篇则来自阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. desc.ko: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Aorona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.jp: Aorona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.

desc.ko: Aorona briefly introduced Sensei with the situations in Abydos, and was shocked at the fact that Abydos High School was being attacked. Right away, Sensei went to Abydos on a business trip.
desc.zh_tw: 阿羅娜向老師簡單介紹了一下阿拜多斯當地的情況，並對“阿拜多斯學院”被攻擊一事感到驚異。之後，老師立刻到阿拜多斯自治區出差。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜向老师简单介绍了一下阿拜多斯当地的情况，并对“阿拜多斯学院”被攻击一事感到惊异。之后，老师立刻到阿拜多斯自治区出差。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.

desc.zh_tw: 老師被白子救出來後，抵達阿拜多斯高中的廢校對策委員會社團活動室。然而當時片方頭盔團卻來攻擊阿拜多斯高中， 於是老師就和學生們一起出面擊退他們。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei expressed the fact that he was on a business story but lost. Shiroko said that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offered Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carried Sensei to arrive at school.

desc.zh_tw: 老師在遇見了白子之後，向白子表示自己是來出差的，但苦於找不到路。白子表示周邊地區均已廢棄，並向老師遞能量飲料喝。之後，白子揹著老師到達了學校。

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.thai: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.ko: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_tw: 擊敗頭盔團重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會學生們，再次向老師自我介紹。在老師的幫助下，學校的補給問題已順利解決，這讓學生們非常開心。大夥們想趁勢破壞片方頭盔團的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone was amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduced themselves. Hoshino proposed to engage their outpost and Sensei agreed.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与对策委员会。

desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.thai: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.ko: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_tw: 老師聽說阿拜多斯高中欠下的債務超過9億日圓，僅靠學生 的力量光是償還利息就喘不過氣。老師雖想幫忙學生，但是茜香卻生氣地表示自己信不過大人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是芹香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.thai: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.ko: Back at school, everyone thanked Sensei but accidentally slipped the "debt" thing. Serika expressed her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and left. Nonomi followed her up.
desc.zh_tw: 回到學校後，眾人向老師道謝，卻不小心說出了還債一事。茜香表示對老師不太信任，因而不太願意討論這個話題，選擇離開，野乃美跟隨前往。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。芹香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野宫跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野乃美跟随前往。

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.

Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept happening in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.

desc.zh_tw: 從星野和綾音口中，老師獲知了阿拜多斯欠下9億6235萬元債務的事情，並且得知阿拜多斯地區近年經常發生沙塵暴，學校雖投入大量資金卻仍無法逆轉；由於沒有銀行願意為他們貸款，他們不得不轉向高利貸公司，但沙漠化越來越嚴重，債務水漲船高，償還無望，導致很多學生離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.thai: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.ko: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_tw: 順利從頭盔團手中救出茜香的老師和對策委員會學生們。戰鬥後，綾音從頭盔團所使用的戰車殘骸中，發現奇普托斯外部勢力的痕跡。另一方面，在背後控制頭盔團的凱薩PMC的理事，由於對於接二連三的失敗大失所望，於是便雇用新的便利屋職員來取代頭盔團。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 顺利从头盔团手中救出芹香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a bigger hand in the dark.
desc.jp: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a bigger hand in the dark.
desc.thai: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a bigger hand in the dark.
desc.ko: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a bigger hand in the dark.
desc.zh_tw: 雖然救出了芹香，但吃了一發防空導彈的芹香還是支稜不住。凌音發現頭盔團似乎使用了基沃託斯境內違法使用的武器，認為其背後有更大的幕後黑手。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。凌音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。凌音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。凌音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.zh_tw: 綜合從之前的戰鬥中收集到的情報,對策委員會學生查出，<便利屋68>的職員是格黑娜出身的不良學生，以及頭盔團所使用的武器是從<黑市>流入的事實。老師和對策委員會學生為了尋找其他線索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。

desc.en: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.jp: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.

desc.zh_tw: 老師在路上遇到了綾音，綾音表示要回學校準備還款，並且已經查清了便利店68的資料。這時無月突然出現，邀請老師帶便利屋68看看，被綾音呵斥候離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在路上遇到了绫音，绫音表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了便利店68的资料。这时睦月突然出现，邀请老师带便利屋68看看，被绫音呵斥候离开。

desc.en: Ayane found out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they were seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with caution. On the other hand, Ayane thought that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.zh_tw: 抵達黑市的對策委員會一行人遇上三一綜合學園的學生，野乃美。野乃美是為了購買佩洛洛限定玩偶才來到黑市，但卻被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑當中。對策委員會一行人為了阻止那群小流氓，於是便與他們打了起來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日富美。日富美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，野乃美。野乃美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，野乃美。野乃美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.jp: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.thai: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.ko: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.
desc.zh_tw: 擊敗小流氓的野乃美和對策委員會一行人，為了被捲入更大的騷動而離開現場。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败小流氓的日富美和对策委员会一行人，为了被卷入更大的骚动而离开现场。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force was amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone met Hifumi, who was being chased by some gangsters at that moment, and saved her for good.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人被黑市的規模之大所震驚。就在這時眾人遇到了被混混追趕的野乃美，順手將其救下。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人被黑市的规模之大所震惊。就在这时众人遇到了被混混追赶的日富美，顺手将其救下。

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.thai: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.ko: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人要求野乃美介紹黑市，以作為讓她從小流氓手中脫險的代價。因此一行人便與步美同行一段時間。另一方面，便利屋68的社長亞瑠，為了挽回之前的敗仗而尋找借用資金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长阿露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会一行人要求野乃美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会一行人要求野乃美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: The failure mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocked the PMC, who insisted that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thought the data was nothing wrong and decided to investigate the reasons.

desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68任務失敗，讓PMC方面大為震驚，認為絕對是資料出了問題。黑服認為資料絕對無誤，決定去調查具體原因。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.thai: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.ko: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_tw: 巡視黑市的對策委員會一行人看到，自己所償還的債款流入暗黑銀行。當學生們得知自己努力還的錢被用來做違法勾當，便在一怒之下決定搶銀行。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Everyone discovered that their debt payment seemed to be flowing directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brought up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi was then "willingly" to be involved in this.

desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.thai: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.ko: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在暗黑銀行等著貸款審查，此時蒙面的對策委員會學生們出現在她面前把現金偷走。黑市保鑣緊追在對策委員會一行人身後。亞瑠對對策委員會學生讓自己看見的壞蛋的真面目投以充滿憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。阿露对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。亚瑠对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。亚瑠对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: Aru was rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos broke in.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠因記錄不良、無法進行財產抵押被拒絕貸款，而正與工作人員理論時，阿拜多斯一行人闖了進來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。

desc.en: The Abydos threatened the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally took out 100-million-worth money. Aru was greatly amazed by the side; other members were just chilling there. After the robbery, the security called for the Black Market guards, and everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The Abydos threatened the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally took out 100-million-worth money. Aru was greatly amazed by the side; other members were just chilling there. After the robbery, the security called for the Black Market guards, and everyone began to engage.
desc.thai: The Abydos threatened the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally took out 100-million-worth money. Aru was greatly amazed by the side; other members were just chilling there. After the robbery, the security called for the Black Market guards, and everyone began to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 阿拜多斯一行人威脅工作人員交出了記錄，順便把一億日元的資金給拿了出來。亞瑠在旁邊大為震撼，極為讚歎；其他成員在旁邊靜靜觀察。搶完後，銀行保安叫來了黑市守衛，眾人隨即開始作戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿拜多斯一行人威胁工作人员交出了记录，顺便把一亿日元的资金给拿了出来。阿露在旁边大为震撼，极为赞叹；其他成员在旁边静静观察。抢完后，银行保安叫来了黑市守卫，众人随即开始作战。

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成員取得的錢攻擊阿拜多斯高中。對此，亞瑠感到良心的譴責而苦惱不斷。為了鼓勵無精打采的亞瑠，便利屋職員們一同前往柴關拉麵店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出現在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚對再戰阿拜多斯一行人而擔憂，遙香則佈置好了炸彈。無月不解為什麼亞瑠不先收錢辦事，亞瑠則說是怕被顧客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么阿露不先收钱办事，阿露则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。

desc.en: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.

desc.zh_tw: 中間有人提出了回到格黑娜的選項，但佳代子謹慎分析了形勢，認為由於有風紀委員會，尤其是陽奈的存在，他們幾乎沒有勝算，回去其實挺不實際的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是日奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在柴關拉麵店吃拉麵時，聽了老闆的窩心鼓勵，終於承受不住良心的譴責而放聲喊叫。然而遙香卻誤解亞的喊叫，反而把炸彈裝在店裡，把柴關拉麵店炸得不留痕跡。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistook the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realized that it was the restaurant that prevented her being a real villain. Haruka, who was unsure of Aru's saying, blew up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistook the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realized that it was the restaurant that prevented her being a real villain. Haruka, who was unsure of Aru's saying, blew up the restaurant without a second thought.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，阿露突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.thai: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.ko: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的學生歡迎了開發部一行人。響主動提出要為愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一門軌道炮上。亞都梨主動為愛麗絲介紹了這門傑作，提到由於資金問題這門大砲的研發已經終止。工程師部眾人本以為愛麗絲無法舉起它，但後者不僅拿起了它，還不小心給房頂開了個洞；不得已，工程師部決定測試遊戲開發部眾人的能力，達標後才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.

Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部為了解讀暗號閱覽<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>諮詢。真紀回答說，如果想解讀暗號，需要有被學生會扣押的駭客工具<鏡子>。一行人為了拿回<鏡子>，便前往由女僕部看守的學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.thai: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.ko: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先為大家帶來了壞消息：桃井的遊戲存檔不可恢復，桃井聽到立刻哭了起來。不過，真紀通過分析文件元數據，確認了文件的真實性，但卻無法破解密碼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理部的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.

desc.zh_tw: 真紀認為，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密碼，應該還能行得通。然而一款正是照此設計的工具“鏡子”卻被學生會沒收。因為是部長製作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算將其取回——這與開發部眾人不謀而合，於是他們便提出要突襲千年學生會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井還對是否參與有所顧忌，但綠已經決定：遊戲開發部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保護這一切。愛麗絲從玩過的四十多款RPG中得出結論，冒險路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，並希望老師能夠去找工程師部一起行動。

desc.en: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.jp: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.thai: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.ko: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.zh_tw: 從莫名其妙的夢中醒來之後，老師從聯邦學生會的幹部七神琳那裡聽到聯邦學生會長消失的消息。由於聯邦學生會長失蹤，學園城市奇普托斯陷入混亂。為了解決這場混亂，老師和學生會的幹部一同前往夏萊社團室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。

desc.en: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.jp: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.

desc.ko: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. desc.zh_tw: 在招待室裡，來自千年的優香，三一的蓮實和鈴美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在為學生會會長消失後的各種混亂情況要個說法。琳在眾人面前坦白了學生會會長下落不明的新聞，而老師則向所有人打招呼。琳向眾人介紹了老師，並要眾人保衛老師到達夏萊；路上，眾人受到攻擊，三人開始作戰，老師則在後方指揮。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。

desc.en: A festival is held in D.U. in celebration of Valentine's Day. Sensei goes on patrol after the Valkyrie Police School's Fubuki and Kirino request assistance in maintaining the security of the festival.
desc.jp: A festival is held in D.U. in celebration of Valentine's Day. Sensei goes on patrol after the Valkyrie Police School's Fubuki and Kirino request assistance in maintaining the security of the festival.
desc.thai: A festival is held in D.U. in celebration of Valentine's Day. Sensei goes on patrol after the Valkyrie Police School's Fubuki and Kirino request assistance in maintaining the security of the festival.
desc.ko: A festival is held in D.U. in celebration of Valentine's Day. Sensei goes on patrol after the Valkyrie Police School's Fubuki and Kirino request assistance in maintaining the security of the festival.
desc.zh_tw: 為了迎接情人節的到來，D.U.自治區舉辦了一場慶典。在女武神警察學園的吹雪和桐乃的拜託之下，老師接下了慶典周邊的治安巡邏工作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 为了迎接情人节的到来，D.U.自治区举办了一场庆典。在女武神警察学园的吹雪和桐乃的拜托之下，老师接下了庆典周边的治安巡逻工作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 为了迎接情人节的到来，D.U.自治区举办了一场庆典。在女武神警察学园的吹雪和桐乃的拜托之下，老师接下了庆典周边的治安巡逻工作。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 为了迎接情人节的到来，D.U.自治区举办了一场庆典。在女武神警察学园的吹雪和桐乃的拜托之下，老师接下了庆典周边的治安巡逻工作。

desc.en: Kirino and Fubuki, two students from the Public Safety Bureau, asked Sensei to patrol with them on Valentine's Day.
desc.jp: Kirino and Fubuki, two students from the Public Safety Bureau, asked Sensei to patrol with them on Valentine's Day.
desc.thai: Kirino and Fubuki, two students from the Public Safety Bureau, asked Sensei to patrol with them on Valentine's Day.
desc.ko: Kirino and Fubuki, two students from the Public Safety Bureau, asked Sensei to patrol with them on Valentine's Day.
desc.zh_tw: 來自生活安全域性的吹雪和桐乃兩位學生來找老師，希望能與他們在情人節那天一起巡邏。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 来自生活安全局的吹雪和桐乃两位学生来找老师，希望能与他们在情人节那天一起巡逻。

desc.en: The street was crowded with people. All kinds of shops have signs with various chocolates promotion and discounts. As Sensei enjoyed the celebration, Sensei met two Helmet Gang membered and accidentally had trouble with them.
desc.jp: The street was crowded with people. All kinds of shops have signs with various chocolates promotion and discounts. As Sensei enjoyed the celebration, Sensei met two Helmet Gang membered and accidentally had trouble with them.

desc.zh_tw: 大街上人山人海，各種店鋪都打出了各種巧克力和優惠的招牌。就在老師享受慶典時，老師遇到了兩名頭盔圈成員，結果與他們不小心起了衝突。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大街上人山人海，各种店铺都打出了各种巧克力和优惠的招牌。就在老师享受庆典时，老师遇到了两名头盔圈成员，结果与他们不小心起了冲突。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大街上人山人海，各种店铺都打出了各种巧克力和优惠的招牌。就在老师享受庆典时，老师遇到了两名头盔圈成员，结果与他们不小心起了冲突。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 大街上人山人海，各种店铺都打出了各种巧克力和优惠的招牌。就在老师享受庆典时，老师遇到了两名头盔圈成员，结果与他们不小心起了冲突。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.zh_cn:

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
